/* com.innobiz.orange.web.or.dao.OrUserPwDDao.selectOrUserPwD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.ODUR_UID, T.PW_TYP_CD, TO_CHAR(T.MOD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MOD_DT, T.MODR_UID, T.PW_ENC,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM OR_USER_PW_D T
AND T.ODUR_UID = #{odurUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.PW_TYP_CD = #{pwTypCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.ODUR_UID IN ( #{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.ODUR_UID, T.PW_TYP_CD
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
